entity.name: Dominic Raab eliminated from Conservative leadership race
entity.description: The number of candidates in the Conservative leadership race goes down to five as Dominic Raab failed to meet the required 33-vote threshold.

text: @piersmorgan My partner is a long time Tory supporter but is now having  second thoughts. Very disappointed with Boris Johnson during the floods and now with this coronavirus, late in lockdown, lack of PPE and the Dominic Cummings situation.
